heading: Static site generators
paragraph: Tried, tested, and reviewed by the community

productCards.title: ShipFast — Ship your startup in days, not weeks
productCards.description: The NextJS boilerplate with all the stuff you need to get your product in front of customers. From idea to production in 5 minutes.

productCards.title: Vite — Next Generation Frontend Tooling
productCards.description: Vite is a build tool that aims to provide a faster and leaner development experience for modern web projects. A dev server that provides rich feature enhancements. A build command that bundles your code, pre-configured to output highly optimized static assets.

productCards.title: Nuxt — The Vue framework for web architects
productCards.description: An open source framework to create performant and production-grade full-stack web apps and websites with confidence.

productCards.title: Cloudflare Pages — Build Fast Sites. In Record Time.
productCards.description: Cloudflare Pages is a JAMstack platform for frontend developers to collaborate and deploy websites.

productCards.title: Astro — The web framework that scales with you.
productCards.description: Build fast content-driven websites, powerful SPA web applications, dynamic server APIs and everything in-between.

productCards.title: Cloudflare Workers — Your site. Our network.
productCards.description: Build blazing fast websites by seamlessly deploying static assets alongside your APIs and application code.

productCards.title: Shipixen — Create a blog & landing page in minutes
productCards.description: Create a production-ready landing page & blog with your branding, theme & pages. You get the code & an SEO-optimized website so you can focus on building, not setting up.

productCards.title: Eleventy — A simpler static site generator.
productCards.description: A simpler static site generator. An alternative to Jekyll. Written in JavaScript. Transforms a directory of templates (of varying types) into HTML. Works with HTML, Markdown, JavaScript, Liquid, Nunjucks, Handlebars, Mustache, EJS, Haml, and Pug.

productCards.title: BoilerBay — Launch your dream project 10x faster
productCards.description: The NextJS Starter Kit with everything you need to ship your product in days, not weeks. From idea to production 10x Faster.

productCards.title: Startup Idea Tester — Test your idea in days not months
productCards.description: Startup Idea Tester is here to revolutionize the way you validate your business ideas. Designed for founders with a lot of ideas, this powerful boilerplate allows you to focus on the marketing aspects and starting getting quickly emails with a waitlist system.
